Hi, I‚Äôm Katya, Talent Sourcer representing Wanna. We‚Äôre looking for a Senior Data Engineer (MLOps) to join one of our teams in Portugal or Lithuania!

What we‚Äôre doing essentially is an AI that allows customers to try certain fashion products on themselves without ever leaving their homes! 

Who we‚Äôre looking for:
 ‚ÅÉ Experience building data-pipelines
 ‚ÅÉ Experience with orchestration tools such as Airflow or others

Nice-to-haves:

 ‚ÅÉ Experience with annotation platforms such as Scale, Toloka, Turk etc.

What we offer:

 ‚ÅÉ Paid insurance

Should you have any questions ping @ketyassup

msg_text:
Company: ZERO
Level: Middle/Senior ML/NLP Engineer
Salary range: 4-6k$ net
City: Armenia, Erevan
HR contact: @seda_hakobyan
Apply here: https://zerosystems.rippling-ats.com/job/503448/senior-ml-engineer?s=cw

ZERO - American startup that offers the user an artificial intelligence-based system that reduces the administrative work of routine tasks. Our mission is dramatically reducing the time of routine tasks in the process of people communication and document processing in the legal and financial sector through automatic document and email classification, entity extraction and process mining.
We are looking for a talented ML Engineer to join our research team at ZERO for building AI-powered automation tools for time-consuming administrative tasks.

Responsibilities:
- Design, build, and/or deliver NLP models for Document processing (text classification, NER, RE).
- Create of markup and verification process for NLP tasks to run human-in-the-loop in real business processes
- Leverage continuous integration and continuous deployment best practices, including test automation and monitoring, retrain, maintain, and monitor models in production (MLOps);
- Software development including algorithm implementation, optimization, performance profiling, integration to production systems, testing and documentation;
- Collaborate as part of a cross-functional Agile team to create and enhance software that enables state-of-the-art ML applications.

Qualifications:
- Proficient in one of the deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX);
- Strong practical skills with transformer-based models like BERT, GPT, etc and :hugging_face: library
- Proven programming experience in Python using efficient algorithms and software design patterns;
- Practical experience in Text Classification, Generation, QA or NER problems in NLP
- Deep understanding of data gathering, pre-processing, models as well as post-processing to support fast delivery in production;
- Experience with MLOps tools: DVC, MLflow, W&B, Airflow, CI/CD tools (Gitlab, Jenkins, etc.), Docker, Kubernetes (Kubeflow)
- Excellent communication skills with the ability to educate, influence, and inspire others around.
+ Team Lead:
Superb problem-solving skills, and ability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
2+ years of experience managing engineering teams

Nice to have:
- Experience developing and deploying ML solutions in a public cloud such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform;
- ML industry impact through conference presentations, papers, blog posts, open-source contributions, or patents;
- Kaggle medals as a plus
- Experience in .NET/C# or C++ is a plus;
- Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs in computer science, electrical engineering, mathematics, or a similar field. PhD is a plus;

Our benefits:
- Medical insurance with Dental Services
- Wellness Package (GYM, sports equipment, etc)
- English classes and other learning activities (conference etc)
- Help with relocation and an apartment for the first time

Vacancy: Risk Data Scientist / Risk Analyst   
Company: Gauss Money (https://gauss.money/)                                                                                                                            
Job grade: Middle / Senior
Salary: 4500 - 5500 USD gross, discussed                                                                                             
Employment contract: fulltime, remote
Placement: Individual Entrepreneur                                                                                                

You will
 ‚ÅÉ work with a wide range of behavioral and transactional data
 ‚ÅÉ own Risk and Business Intelligence function (operations, analytics, and reporting)
 ‚ÅÉ develop data-driven champion/challenger decisions strategies to automate credit origination
 ‚ÅÉ design and deploy traditional and advanced machine learning (ML) models to iteratively improve business-critical models and systems that understand a user's behavior and credit risk
 ‚ÅÉ build source-of-truth credit portfolio and risk analysis dashboards to keep team fingers on the pulse
 ‚ÅÉ conduct in-product user research to fuel engineering & product teams with insights
 ‚ÅÉ provide support and guidelines along customers' journeys, ensure customer satisfaction and high-quality credit risk assessment/underwriting

You'll get
 ‚ÅÉ globally resellable and highly in-demand experience in FinTech
 ‚ÅÉ relocation Europe/CIS/Asia and compensation in the currency of your choice
 ‚ÅÉ experience with launching products in the most competitive market in the world
 ‚ÅÉ an opportunity to apply innovative approaches to consumer behavior analysis and management
 ‚ÅÉ steep learning curve across a wide range of hard and soft skills and responsibilities, including risk management
 ‚ÅÉ contribute to building products with a big social mission and world-class customer experiences
 ‚ÅÉ work closely with the founding team in an open, fast-moving, and fun environment
 ‚ÅÉ flexible hours

You got/can
 ‚ÅÉ BA or soon-to-BA in engineering, statistics, physics, math, economics, or similar from a top university
 ‚ÅÉ experience with financial services/credit risk management is a bonus
 ‚ÅÉ break complex problems into smaller ones
 ‚ÅÉ initiative, courage, and self-sufficiency
 ‚ÅÉ enjoy working with data and using tools such as SQL, Python, or SAS
 ‚ÅÉ good business English writing skills

 Interested, pls apply your CV in telegram @linasyan

Senior Data Engineer

ü´• Remote or Relocation

ü´∞ $3.5-5.5k net

Project: launching the first, large-scale e-wallet in Azerbaijan. We aim to create the best-in-class digital payment ecosystem and become number one payment solution in the country. We want to provide our customers with convenient, simple and reliable alternative to cash.

Our company is built on the basis of existing payment terminal business with ~3 mln customers and is also a part of a large holding company in Azerbaijan, with a strong portfolio in financial services.

Role Description:
¬∑ You will design and develop data applications in one of languages: Python, Scala, SQL
¬∑ Develop, customize and manage data integration tools, databases, warehouses, and analytical systems
¬∑ Design, build and maintain scalable data models that are clean, tested, and well documented
¬∑ Work closely with product teams and other stakeholders to desing and build data marts providing reliable and accurate data in a fast way
¬∑ Handle data pipelines and contribute towards data strategy and its execution

Experience, Competencies and Skills Required:
¬∑ At least 2 years of hands-on experience with Python, SQL
¬∑ At least 2 years of hands-on experience with Big Data systems like Hadoop, Spark
¬∑ Experience building data infrastructure using at least one major cloud provider, preferably AWS
¬∑ Strong competencies in algorithms and software architecture

¬∑ Knowledge of Terraform is a plus
¬∑ Knowledge of Scrum, Agile
¬∑ Advanced English, good Russian

msg_text:
#vacancy #office #relocation #ML #HFT #QuantitativeResearch #Trading #Mathematics #Algorithms #DataStructures

üìåQuant/ML Researcher (HFT)
Limassol (Cyprus) or Saint-Petersburg
$6000-10000 net + bonuses

Alber Blanc is a proprietary trading firm with focus on HFT-algorithmic strategies that holds a portfolio of innovative companies in the field of finance, digital assets, telecommunications and autonomous flying vehicles. Our projects are connected to each other and our team works in close collaboration. Starting with one project 10 years ago, now we have four branches and look forward to starting new ones and reaching new heights.

We are looking primarily for someone who has experience in building Machine Learning models, not just someone who has built the pipelines, but someone who understands how to tweak the algorithms and research how the strategies perform etc.

The perfect candidate for this position will have an engineering mindset, excellent problem solving and analytical skills and a strong mathematical background. You will be carrying out fundamental research, working directly with traders to research Alpha‚Äôs and understand their returns.

We‚Äôll trust you:
‚Ä¢ Alpha research, execution research and models performance optimization
‚Ä¢ Perform quantitative research as a part of a team to develop and backtest different ML and statistical models
‚Ä¢ Apply advanced mathematical and statistical methods to build financial models and apply ML to large data sets
‚Ä¢ Explore new trading ideas by analyzing market data and optimize models in close collaboration with other quants
‚Ä¢ Stay up to date with state-of-the-art technologies and tools including technical libraries, computing environments and academic research

We‚Äôre looking for:
‚Ä¢ Advanced degree (PhD preferred) in Applied Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science etc. as well as similar experience in the field of Quantitative Finance
‚Ä¢ Excellent knowledge of probability and statistics, including experimental design, predictive modeling, optimization and inference
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of ML fundamentals, workflows and how to deal with large data sets for analytical approach and quantitative methods
‚Ä¢ Experience in analytics and data science with focusing on time series domain and deploying statistical and ML models into production
‚Ä¢ Experienced with high-or-mid frequency trading strategies (systematic intraday trading)
‚Ä¢ Highly proficient in C++/Python and passionate about Math/DS/ML

We offer you:
‚Ä¢ To join our new promising R&D-direction and wide range of challenging non-trivial tasks
‚Ä¢ To be a part of a data-driven team of highly motivated and skilled engineers, architects, and mathematicians
‚Ä¢ Cutting edge hardware and software in production (fast CPUs and network cards, fresh Linux and GCC, Conan for package management, latest Boost)
‚Ä¢ No pressure from management, flexible workflow and wide range of opportunities to realize your own ideas
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary, social benefits and relocation support
‚Ä¢ Twice per year we have a performance review, according to the results of which you can count on a bonus equal to your annual salary or even more

üìå To apply, please, send your CV to @ValentinGrankin
We also pay refferal bonuses equal to a month salary

Hi all! üëã An ambitious San Fransisco-based startup is looking for a Senior Data Scientist to scale the team. The primary focus is mapping, modeling, and managing business processes by creating digital copies of human or digital interactions using cognitive technologies 

Job title: Senior Data Scientist
Job Type: Full-Time Remote
Salary range: $5000-$7000
Company: Insquad

Tech Stack:
Python, Pandas, Pyspark, Sklearn, Tensorflow, Keras, Databricks

Main tasks: Develop event clustering algorithms implementing them in the form of spark tasks

Responsibilities:
- Participate and lead, multifaceted analytic studies on large volumes of data;
- Work with the Principal data scientist and participate in all the data experiments tasked by the DataScience Team;
- Coordinate research and analytic activities utilizing various data points (unstructured and structured) and employ programming to clean, massage, and organize the data;
- Experiment against data points, provide insights based on experiment results and provide previously undiscovered solutions to command data challenges using a multitude of techniques (e.g., exploratory mathematic and statistical techniques to NLP, vision, process mining, etc.).

Our perfect candidate has:
- Master‚Äôs or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Process Mining, Statistics, Applied Math, Operational research, AI, or related field;
- Overall 5+ years of experience. 3+ years‚Äô practical experience with data processing and analytics;
- Experience and Understanding of Data quality, Features, Aspects of ML Models, ML pipeline/infrastructure.

If you want to apply, please dm me @Daradar

Looking: Deep Learning and Computer Vision Engineer 
Office: Minsk or remote 
Salary:  3-7$
Contact: @Daria_Recruiter

What we looking for:
Experience with Python 5y+.
One of those: Pytorch, Tensorflow. 3y+.
On-hands experience with the development process in DL and ML (Docker, git, TensorBoard, DVC, Weights & Biases, numpy, pandas, sklearn).
Strong knowledge Deep Learning, Computer Vision
Real experience with Objects Detection, Semantic Segmentation.
English proficiency of at least B1.

Preferable qualifications:
Commercial experience of model optimization and on-device inference on iOS and Android clients (CoreML, ONNX, TfLite).
Commercial experience of model inference on server (TensorRT, AWS SageMaker, NVIDIA Triton Inference Server).
Ability to work in tandem with the Engineering Team and visualize and report results of your research to the Product Team.


What we offer:
A team open to suggestions and motivated to achieve the best results;
High level of decision-making freedom;
Remote work or offices;
English language courses;
Sports Compensation Programme;
Medical insurance;
100% vacation pay and medical and other bonuses.

msg_text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #vacancy

We are looking for a Senior Data Analyst

Summary : 
As a senior data analyst, you will drive modeling and visualization of our data, directly impacting the direction of the company.  Leveraging your coding ability and other technical skills, you will drive insights to improve acquisition and retention of high-value members.  You will be a key member of a small, dynamic, highly visible team.

üåç Locations: only Russia / Belarus
üè¶ Salary:  300.000 - 420.000 (rub)

       üìö  Responsibilities: How you'll be spending your day:

üìç Participating as a member of a team to produce business-critical visualizations and reports from DOMO, Qubole, and AWS.
üìç Implementing and maintaining visualizations in DOMO, as well as understanding the semantics of existing visualizations.
üìç Implementing scheduled jobs in Qubole to automate reusable data sets.
üìç Code reviewing and mentoring more junior members of the analytics team.
üìç Interfacing directly with both data engineers and non-technical stakeholders to create high-quality visualizations and reports for our subscription business.
üìç Driving quality, efficiency, and accuracy in reporting, contributing to a culture of highest standards.
üìç Working with data engineering to understand the behavior and integrity of data pipelines and semantics of existing tables in an AWS data lake.
üìç Automating manual processes.


      üõ† Qualifications: What you're bringing:

üìå Expert-level in Hive, Presto, or a similar big data SQL dialect, including window functions, table creation from HDFS or S3, CTEs, and advanced joins.
üìå Expertise in Python, Jupyter, Pandas, and/or Pyspark.
üìå Experience with DOMO or a similar visualization tool, and ability to produce advanced visualizations in DOMO, including Beast Mode and Filters.  (Hands-on DOMO experience strongly preferred).
üìå Ability to work within Qubole to create scheduled jobs and self-updating datasets, and ability to connect those datasets to DOMO.
üìå Ability to use S3 in an AWS environment to create tables and query data.
üìå Ability to use Excel to pivot data and create effective visualizations.
üìå Ability to understand requests from less technical stakeholders and translate them to actionable data and reports in collaboration with data engineering.
üìå Ability to use an Excel DOMO connector to automate data import and visualization in Excel.
üìå Nice to have: An understanding of AB Testing and ability to test for statistical significance.
üìå Nice to have: Familiarity with Google BigQuery and Google Analytics (GA360), and ability to connect the two.  


üì©Contact - @BonsayHR

Leveraging your coding ability and other technical skills, you will drive insights to improve acquisition and retention of high-value members.  You will be a key member of a small, dynamic, highly visible team.

msg_text:
Sales Operations Analyst 

Grintern - California-based company helping young talents to start their careers in US startups

Essential responsibilities:

‚Äî Work with sales funnels (currently, we have 3: cold, warm, and partnerships).
‚Äî Come up with new sales hypotheses and perform A/B testing.
‚Äî Conduct sales analytics and make conclusions regarding each instrument‚Äôs effectiveness.
‚Äî Come up with further plans to improve the conversion of the funnels.
‚Äî Create and analyze reports in Zoho Analytics and manage Zoho CRM.
‚Äî Develop new sales channels based on regular market research.

Requirements:

‚Äî 2+ years of experience with a focus on data analytics. Ideally, experience working with sales conversion funnels, reports, and sales data analytics.
‚Äî Experience using and developing reports, metrics, and dashboards with data analytics, data visualization, and presentation tools. Experience with any CRM system is a must.
‚Äî Understanding of sales process and ability to translate business needs into sales enablement programs. Aptitude for framing business questions in analytic terms and translating business requirements into useful datasets and analyses with actionable insights.
‚Äî Understanding of sales metrics and ability to tie programs to KPIs and metrics set for sales growth.
‚Äî Passion for sales and channel success and readiness to participate on a team responsible for increasing sales productivity and improving efficiencies of the sales through planned sales enablement activities.
‚Äî Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills; highly professional and diplomatic approach.
‚Äî Fluency in Russian and proficiency in English, ability to work, read, analyze, and write case studies & outreach templates in English.
‚Äî Highly structured and data-driven mindset.
‚Äî Ability to work with new hires, engage, explain tasks, mentor, and help ramp up sales productivity quickly.
‚Äî Desire to develop in Sales.

What we offer:

‚Äî Full-time employment (8 working hours per day, Monday-Friday).
‚Äî Partially flexible working hours. We are all located in different time zones, however, we make sure that we all overlap every day between 13:00 and 18:00 Warsaw time. Also, our founder lives in the USA and we‚Äôre adjusting the time of the team calls to the California time zone, which usually means having calls at around 19:00-21:00 Warsaw time.
‚Äî Fully remote work.
‚Äî Opportunity to contribute to the company with an inspiring mission.
‚Äî Opportunity to grow within the company - we consider only the candidates looking for a long-term commitment and desiring to manage a sales team.
‚Äî Salary will be discussed during the interview.

Salary: 600-1100 USD
contacts: tania@grintern.co, @khrustalevata (tg)

Data Engineer with experience on the Spark
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #dataengineer
Company: Mad Devs
https://maddevs.io/careers/dataengineer_spark/
Fulltime
Remote, location doesn't matter
Salary range: 3000-4000 usd net per month
We are looking for a Data Engineer with experience on the Spark for one of our major projects

Responsibilities:
- Design, implement, and maintain data collection pipelines for our ML models.
- Work together with the software development team to ensure product quality and reliability.
- Implement automated quality assurance and CI/CD processes.

Our expectations:
- 5+ years experience in software development.
- Experience in Big Data projects from 3 years
- Experience in software development on Spark, Hadoop, Hive.
- Knowledge of classical algorithms and data structures
- Conversational English

Conditions:
- Awesome colleagues and managers.
- Competitive salary, dollar-pegged rate (or payment in dollars), flexible form of remuneration.
- Official employment, legal assistance in registration of cooperation.
- Expert development team. The management of the company has an engineering background. We regularly hold engineering meetings, where we discuss the difficulties we face in the process of work and technological innovations
Opportunity to study at the expense of the company: courses, electronic library, participation and presentation at conferences. We ourselves regularly make presentations at such conferences as FOSDEM, TeamLeadConf, GolanfConf, GDG DevFests and others, so we will help with the preparation of the report

Send your CV  here in Telegram to @panarinrn

msg_text:
Vacancy: Senior Backend Developer 
Salary: $4000-6000 / month 

Who  we are: We are Optic, an early start-up team, developing a revolutionary product on the intersection of Machine Learning and Web3.

Our team consists of engineering gurus, with the background in building top-notch solutions along with programming and hackathons champions, including Google, EORA, Revolut and others. We attracted top crypto and Web2 investors. Specifically, we developed an NFT validation algorithm based on images and GIFs that was proved as being better than the algorithms of the closest competitors.



Who you are: Web3 enthusiast, blockchain native and an excellent backend developer (Python, Node.js) with proven experience in blockchain technology (L1, L2, Dapps) with the strong desire to join a project of skyrocketing potential and work with stellar peers and visionary leaders. 

What you bring to the table: Curiosity, drive for progress, lifelong learning mindset, let‚Äôs do it attitude, readiness to get hands dirty, hunger for new knowledge and ambition of having a stake in creating new era, and:
üîçYou speak Upper-Intermediate English

üîçExisting work permit in EU or other locations outside Russia or desire to relocate along with the ability to travel at least 4 times a year
üîç5+ years of experience in software development with 2+ years of experience in developing and implementing Blockchain platforms or services
üîçGood knowledge of blockchain technology: consensus mechanisms (PoW, PoS), smart contracts, oracles.
üîçGood understanding of token standards: ERC20, ERC721, ERC1155.
üîçExperience in Web3 - Solidity Smart Contracts and web3 products (EVM-based, Solana, Flow, Polkadot)
Experience in cloud, preferred background - AWS - EC2, ELK, S3.
üîçExperience in Backend Development - JavaScript (Node, Express) and/or Python (FastAPI, Asyncio)
üîçExperience in Truffle or Hardhat
üîçExperience in Docker
üîçExperience in the NFT space will be a plus
üîçFull-stack abilities (e.g. data management, server architecture etc.) is a competitive advantage
What will you do:
üóùYou will be writing services to crawl all existing blockchains (EVMs, Solana, etc).
üóùBuild data flow pipelines for retrieved blockchain data.
üóùDesign the scalable architecture of backend applications, including APIs & databases.
üóùSetup and manage test automation & CI/CD processes.
What we offer:
üß©Opportunity to take part in cutting-edge product development with the guidance from world-class brand-name mentors
üß©Full support with relocation (Dubai Work permits and Residency;  etc)
üß©Flexible working
üß©Culture of transparency and continuous growth
Interested? Send your CV and recommendations to TG@OllySmiths or @MFedin 
NOTE: we will not accept any recruitment services offers or proactive resumes from agencies and/or IT-recruiters

msg_text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #ml #speechsynthesis #datascience #relocation #remote 

InTone created a voice processing technology that neutralises accents in real-time. 
Our mission is to enable seamless communication between people from different cultures. We are backed by Berkeley SkyDeck accelerator and angels with major exits in AI and BPO areas.

We built a unique machine learning pipeline and moved voice tech from 2s+ latencies to less than 500ms. You can use our application for Zoom calls, and we see a huge interest in the call center industry. InTone does not require expensive GPUs and runs on an average laptop.

As a member of our fast-paced team, you will have the unique opportunity to create technology that will be used by millions of people every day. You must be passionate about building new technologies, ready to learn on the fly and solve complex challenges in Speech AI.


In this role you will:
- Optimize inference on CPU by improving model implementation
- Implement ML models with new frameworks
- Find best pipeline configurations for the speed/quality trade-off
- Work on improving naturalness and intonation of generated voices
- Identify and debug audio artefacts and pipeline errors
- Read and implement research papers from 2021-22
- Manage audio data collection

Looking for:
- Experience in deploying ML models on desktop/mobile devices
- Knowledge of ONNX/nebullvm/other performance ML libraries
- Understanding of Deep Learning area: NLP / Computer Vision / Speech Technologies
- Proactivity and readiness to tackle complex challenges, as you will be responsible for a significant part of the project

Bonus points:
- Experience with training or deploying ASR/TTS models
- Experience in development of desktop applications
- Participation in hackathons and Machine Learning Competitions
- Knowledge of the fast-pace startup environment

We offer:
- Working with state-of-the-art technology
- Leading a project in an environment of the Bay Area startup
- Leverage our network to work with industry experts in any area
- Stock options on at the level of the first employees
- Relocation package: Serbia, Armenia, Thailand & others 

Salary: $50-70K / year (Middle), $70-100K / year (Senior)


Contact: @AnyaSokol.

msg_text:
Fleetcor, global corporation that provides business payments invites an AWS Sagemaker Solution Architect.
remotely or relocation to Vilnius, Lithuania

Key job responsibilities
‚Ä¢  Design the AWS infrastructure solution for analytics/machine learning projects.
‚Ä¢  Design and build SageMaker-based pipeline architecture.
‚Ä¢  Employ other AWS-based products & services to design comprehensive solution
‚Ä¢  Design integrations to communicate decisions from the Sagemaker model to execution systems.
‚Ä¢  Technical guidance, provide recommendations on platform selection and build vs buy decisions.
‚Ä¢  Design the solution for sending decisions to systems like CRM, Marketing Cloud, Ecommerce,..
‚Ä¢  Design the Data architecture for master data governance of selected common data structures (e.g. Product Catalog, Customer Accounts and Contacts and integrate the data structures to operational systems)
‚Ä¢  Interact with the AWS Data Lake team to bring efficient solutions of business problematics
‚Ä¢  Prepare and present technical training content that introduces SageMaker to a broad audience both internally and externally.

Basic Qualifications
‚Ä¢  Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, mathematics, or related field of study.
‚Ä¢  7+ years of professional work experience in the field of Analytics.
‚Ä¢  Experience with building and deploying machine learning models with SageMaker, data preparation and transformation.
‚Ä¢  Excellent communication skills.
We offer:
‚Ä¢  Work in a highly qualified international team (English and Russian speaking)
‚Ä¢  An employment contract and a work visa in Lithuania or the opportunity to work remotely
‚Ä¢  Permanent full-time job

Contact:
+79110199509
nadezhda.minkina@fleetcor.ru
https://t.me/n_minkina_HR

msg_text:
Relocation to UAE
International Institute of Education presents

Mohamed Bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence (MBZUAI) in Abu Dhabi. It is a modern and innovative university offering a choice of graduate programs in Artificial Intelligence that are relevant to market needs, with an aim to help students succeed in their chosen careers and leverage their acquired knowledge to tackle some of the greatest challenges of our time. 

The fully-funded scholarships are available for candidates with a minimum of Bachelor‚Äôs degree in a S.T.E.M field such as Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, and other relevant Science and Engineering majors.

MBZUAI aims to support the advancement of scientific research, development, transfer, and use of Artificial Intelligence through the introduction of MSc and Ph.D. programs that allow students to fulfill their intellectual potential in a state-of-the-art environment. Accepted students will receive full scholarships to attend MBZUAI.

Eligible candidates should apply for admission to the university for Fall 2022 with an application deadline of April 30, 2022. 

SCHOLARSHIP INFORMATION:
All admitted students on full-time basis are granted upon acceptance the privilege to complete their study with a full scholarship including:

*100% tuition fees
* Accommodation
* Annual air travel
* Health insurance and other benefits

Additionally, Masters students receive a monthly stipend of 8,000 DH (USD $2100) and Ph.D. students receive 10,000 DH (USD $2700)

The scholarships are available for MS or PhD degrees in -
* Computer Vision
* Machine Learning
* Natural Language Processing

How to apply

1.  Fill out the Candidate interest form:
https://share.hsforms.com/1jIEwYA0aRDuo-dMXg3YvAw4rutp

2. Sign up for Zoom meeting with MBZUAI advisor. https://calendly.com/shahruh/mbzuai

The entire admission process is free of charge to a student.

Where to find more info?

Visit the university's website: https://mbzuai.ac.ae/study/admissions

Chat with MBZUAI current students and other applicants @mbzuai_eurasia

Questions? Ask @shahruh_iie

Electronics and Mechanical Engineering Expert

Company: Hawk-Research
Part-time, Contract, Freelance
Salary: 20 - 120 $ per Hour

Hawk Research is looking for Electronics and Mechanical/Civil Engineering expert to provide assistance on our projects in academic research sphere. We are building a knowledge sharing platform to help people during their studies, so they can improve their level in mentioned disciplines.

We strive to help our clients facilitate learning and improve their performance through modern technology and knowledge-sharing services. We are looking for self-organized experts with specialization in Electronics/Electrical and Mechanical/Civil Engineering who can help us and our customers with various projects.

Job Responsibilities

Fulfilling various small projects related to Electronics Engineering, Electronics Design, Electric Power System design; if your tend to do Mechanical and Civil Engineering - work AutoCAD and Modelling

Requirements / Qualifications (one of the mentioned or few):

Electronics Engineering
Electronics Design
Electrical CAD Drafting/Designing
Electric Power System design
Civil or Mechanical Engineering

Benefits/What We offer

Flexible schedule
Fully remote job
Ability to combine this job with your main job or other projects

 turuk@hawk-research.com

We are an American based company is looking for Rockstar Developers to work on our microservices applications. We are looking for self-motivated people to join our awesome team and help us build the platform of the future. We have application development needs in AI, Communications, ML, and AR/VR, Front End, and Back End. If you are passionate about technology, then join our team of Russian/English Speaking Developers!
Responsibilities
‚Ä¢  Build Voicebot Application for our Command Center and Hosted Call Center Platform
‚Ä¢  Develop new ASR and SST models and algorithms
‚Ä¢  Develop our Machine learning engine to run at scale using Microservices.

‚Ä¢  Develop and apply automatic labeling techniques
‚Ä¢  Work together with Back End and Product teams for features implementation
Requirements
Must have:
‚Ä¢  Minimal level of English Pre-Advanced (C1) and higher ‚Äì MUST!
‚Ä¢  3-5 years or more as Senior Developer
‚Ä¢  Design patterns and microservices experience
‚Ä¢  Good knowledge of modern Audio Domain: ASR, TTS, VAD etc.

‚Ä¢  Modern ML/DL stack: Python3, Numpy, Pytorch, Keras/Tensorflow, Sklearn, Pandas, Git
‚Ä¢  Experience working on Enterprise applications
‚Ä¢  Experience with Docker
‚Ä¢  Familiarity with MsSQL server (T-SQL), Redis, RabbitMq
‚Ä¢  Experience working in or managing a team environment

msg_text:
üî•Data Analyst (remote)

Company: Zencastr
Full-time

As a Data Analyst at Zencastr, you will partner with different departments and teams to make data-driven decisions that ship better products by delivering product insights and strategic recommendations based upon quantitative analysis. You will be involved in driving data-based decisions and lead initiatives to improve operational efficiency.

üìÑWhat You'll Do..

- Partner across departments to build a rapport and be a trusted advisor to team members; Use an analytical perspective to inform decision making and help drive a focus on the most impactful ideas
- Navigate ambiguity of stakeholder requests and formulate hypotheses while building consensus
- Design and build advanced analytical solutions and products to deliver superior business outcomes using research and performing quantitative and qualitative analysis
- Identify trends and opportunities to drive product growth and nurture a healthy ecosystem
- Use BI tooling, construct core dashboards, visualizations, and analyses to help stakeholders monitor product health and make better decisions
- Communicate insights to stakeholders distilling complex analysis into accessible learnings; Deliver effective presentations to influence multiple levels of stakeholders

If This Describes You..

- 2+ years of data analytics experience, preferably for SaaS companies (internships count!)
- Strong SQL - experience navigating and working with data sets and developing data pipelines using SQL
- Undergraduate degree in quantitative major (Finance, Economics, Math, Computer Science) or equivalent experience
- Experience working with Product teams
- Foundational understanding of data modeling best practices
- Experience using BI visualization tools like Metabase, Looker, Power BI or Tableau
- Experience using Analytics tools like Google Analytics, FullStory, Heap, Amplitude, Mixpanel
- Able to summarize, explain and simplify complex data analyses and concepts
- Ability to manage multiple deliverables simultaneously and proactively communicate changes and roadblocks

üí∞Great Benefits

- Paid medical
- 3 weeks of PTO plus everyone gets the day off for their birthday!
- 12 weeks 100% Paid Family Leave
- 401(k)
- $1,500/year stipend for home office needs
- $500/year stipend for home fitness needs
- Free podcast equipment for all employees
- Employee Stock Option Plan

üì©Contacts:
jameel@zencastr.com

Research Analyst
EXPERIENCE: 1‚Äì3 years
LOCATION: MOSCOW
CONTRACT: FIXED-TERM 1 year with yearly prolongation opportunity

APPLY IF:
‚Ä¢  You are interested to dive deep into the media & entertainment industry, 
‚Ä¢  You have Bachelor‚Äôs degree or equivalent in sociology or economics,
‚Ä¢  You have experience in organizing quantitative\qualitative research,
‚Ä¢  You have fluent English and strong PowerPoint skills,
‚Ä¢  You consent to the fixed-term duration of the role.

THE JOB:
The role is responsible for Research function and support of Strategy function in ViacomCBS Russia: 
‚Ä¢  Compile data and prepare analytical slides and strategic decks on key relevant industries (VoD market, Ad sales, Theatrical, Consumer products and other),
‚Ä¢  Organization of quantitative and qualitative projects through 3rd party partners, 
‚Ä¢  Analysis of TV measurement data provided by Mediascope (monthly reports, ad hoc requests from the team),
‚Ä¢  Coordination and communication of global research findings across RCIS, 
‚Ä¢  Influencing the strategic direction of the business through delivering analytic insights to key stakeholders.

WE OFFER
‚Ä¢  Fully remote working arrangement,
‚Ä¢  Competitive pay,
‚Ä¢  Fixed-term work contract 1 year, renewable,
‚Ä¢  Flexible working day,
‚Ä¢  We are proud of our friendly and supportive working environment.

Please apply with your resume and a cover letter: Russiarecruitment@vimn.com 
For more information on the Job please follow the link: https://hh.ru/vacancy/48839035

msg_text:
Senior Software Engineer - Database Internals
–ó–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞: –æ—Ç 5000$ 
–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: Querify Labs
–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: –ø–æ–ª–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å, —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ
–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã: @devozerov, vozerov@querifylabs.com

What We Do
In Querify Labs, we help technology companies build innovative data management products. We create SQL optimizers, distributed query engines, transactional protocols, and storage layers.
Our customers are startups from the USA, Europe, and Israel, building new database products to address emerging and unique niches in the data management market.
We are a small team making a large impact with a solid background in database engines and distributed systems. Before joining Querify Labs, we worked on Apache Ignite, Hazelcast, Yandex Clickhouse, and Yandex Database projects. Now we bring our expertise at scale, helping technology companies advance their database products. We accumulate new expertise every day and share it with the community through our blog and international conferences, such as ApacheCon and Percona Live. We are active contributors to Apache Calcite and Apache Ignite projects.

Responsibilities
- Design and implement database components in C++ or Java. You will work on SQL optimizers, vectorized and compiled query engines, distributed protocols, and storage engines.
- Participate in research activities in the area of data management. You will work with academic papers, and consult with top-notch researchers to synthesize solutions.
- Write blog posts, speak at conferences.

Requirements
- Expert knowledge of C++ or Java.
- Experience in database engines or distributed systems.
- Excellent analytical skills.
- Fluency in English (both written and spoken).

Benefits
- High salary, definitively above the market
- Extraordinary complex and interesting tasks. 
- Fully remote work.
- Ability to speak at international conferences.

msg_text:
Machine Learning Tech Lead
Enhesa  Brussels Metropolitan Area
Full-time ¬∑ Mid-Senior level
51-200 employees ¬∑ Legal Services
Salary: 35-45 thousand euros per year + bonuses

About the job
Who are we and what can we offer?
Enhesa is a global company with more than 40 nationalities working together daily all over the world. Moreover, Enhesa is a fast-growing company with tremendous ambitions to be the world‚Äôs most famous brands‚Äô ‚Äúgo-to partner‚Äù for all information on environmental, health and safety compliance! You will work from our Brussels office, from where you will be enjoying the diversity in cultures.

As part our highly dynamic team, we offer:
‚Ä¢  A competitive salary package & benefits in line with the location you will work from.
‚Ä¢  Flexibility, work/life balance, a fast-paced and driven environment.
‚Ä¢  A position with room for creativity and innovation, supported by clear objectives and pursuit for operational excellence
‚Ä¢  Accountability and pride for your projects

Who are you?
Enhesa is looking for an innovative, curious, self-driven, and solution-oriented Machine Learning Tech Lead; well versed in statistical analysis, text representation, and machine learning technologies. The Machine Learning Tech Lead collaborates with other expert talents to develop NLP algorithms and engines for the enhancement of our systems and processes and to drive efficiency and effectiveness in the content creation and quality workflows. In addition to excellent technical skills, the Machine Learning Tech Lead has great communication skills and can therefore make complex issues understandable to different audiences.

While keeping track of innovation and industry best practices, the Machine Learning Tech Lead also constantly seeks ways to identify and gather intelligence, insights, trends and metadata from the vast amount of compliance content we author in a wide variety of languages. 

What would be your key responsibilities?
‚Ä¢  Collaborate with relevant expert talents to identify and prioritize ML enhancements in line with business needs
‚Ä¢  Study and transform data science prototypes
‚Ä¢  Identify appropriate datasets and drive annotation for supervised learning techniques
‚Ä¢  Design and develop ML applications and products, with a back-end focus
‚Ä¢  Develop, adapt and implement the right algorithms for ML tasks
‚Ä¢  Iteratively (re-)train the developed models and run evaluation experiments, performing statistical analysis of results
‚Ä¢  Ensure the integration of ML solutions with existing or new services and applications
‚Ä¢  Track new state-of-the-art machine learning solutions, emerging technologies and developments in academia
‚Ä¢  Translate and communicate technical concepts and solutions to different stakeholders

What would you bring to the table?
‚Ä¢  Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, artificial intelligence, mathematics, or related field
‚Ä¢  At least two years of experience as a natural language processing engineer, preferably in regulatory services field and/or publishing industry
‚Ä¢  Fluency in English is required, any additional language skills are an asset. Knowledge of data structures, semantic extraction, and modeling
‚Ä¢  Knowledge of text representation (e.g., n-grams, sentiment analysis, bag of words, etc.)
‚Ä¢  Expertise in technologies such as Python, R, Docker and AWS

msg_text:
Research Engineer at the Skoltech NLP group
Skolkovo Institute of Science and Technology
Full-time ¬∑ Junior-Senior level
Salary: starting from 125k RUR for a junior engineer up to 250k RUR for senior candidates

About the job
In this role, you will join the Natural Language Processing (NLP) group at Skolkovo Institute of Science and Technology (Skoltech) and work on various collaborative projects with industrial and academic partners. You will work together with Skoltech researchers and develop experiments and prototypes at the frontier of AI/NLP research. You will need to engage with research topics and cover new domains quickly; build deep expertise with modern deep learning and natural language processing tools; apply high standards to the research code. You will gain valuable experience in natural language processing, publish academic papers and help push forward the natural language understanding systems. To learn more about our research visit https://sites.skoltech.ru/nlp/.

At the Skoltech NLP group, our objective is to design computer systems that can understand, analyze, generate, and do other kinds of processing of natural language. For this purpose, we develop novel methods for natural language processing, which are based mostly on statistical and neural machine learning techniques (e.g. deep learning). Our objective is to deliver world-class research and publish results in international conferences such as ACL, EMNLP, and COLING but also apply the developed technologies in real-world high-impact scenarios through collaboration with our industrial partners.

As part our team, we offer:
‚Ä¢ a flexible schedule with a possibility of remote work.
‚Ä¢ Access to modern computational resources (e.g. servers with modern GPUs, e.g. NVIDIA 3090Ti, and CPUs).
‚Ä¢ Office is located in Skolkovo in the new campus of Skoltech.
‚Ä¢ While working as a research engineer you may prepare working on a PhD thesis in NLP on the basis of your project, if interested.

RESEARCH ENGINEER (NLP) RESPONSIBILITIES
‚Ä¢ Develop methods based on state-of-the-art machine learning and neural
‚Ä¢ network methodologies for solving natural language processing tasks. Collaborate with Skoltech NLP Research Scientists to facilitate research that enables learning the semantics of text.

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS
‚Ä¢ 2+ years experience in a full-time software engineering position at a company or a research lab.
‚Ä¢ B.S. degree in Computer Science or related computational field.
‚Ä¢ Profound experience in developing and debugging in Python.
‚Ä¢ Deep knowledge of Python libraries: numpy, scipy, pandas, sklearn.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing (at least on the basis of massive open online courses, e.g. Coursera).
‚Ä¢ Fluency with git, bash, Linux.

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
‚Ä¢ 1+ year(s) experience in a software engineering role with emphasis on machine learning and deep learning.
‚Ä¢ M.S. degree in Computer Science or related quantitative field.
‚Ä¢ Experience in building systems based on machine learning and especially deep learning.
‚Ä¢ Experience in building natural language processing systems: text classification, machine translation (MT), sentiment analysis (SA), information extraction (IE), relation extraction, semantic parsing (SRL), sequence tagging, especially named entity recognition (NER), especially chatbots and dialogue systems.
‚Ä¢ Experience with deep learning frameworks: PyTorch, Tensorflow, and Keras.
‚Ä¢ Experience of using NLP packages: HuggingFace Transformers, AllenNLP,
‚Ä¢ SpaCy, NLTK, Flair, Gensim, word2vec, doc2vec, fastText, DeepPavlov, etc.
‚Ä¢ Experience in using machine learning libs: XGBoost, CatBoost, LightGBM, etc.
‚Ä¢ Experience of working with Docker/Singularity.
‚Ä¢ Experience with the following models and algorithms: CRF, LSTM, GRU,
‚Ä¢ Transformer, Seq2Seq, attention, CNN, SGNS, ELMo, BERT, RoBERTa, etc.

If interested, please contact:
Prof. Alexander Panchenko <a.panchenko@skoltech.ru>
https://faculty.skoltech.ru/people/alexanderpanchenko

msg_text:
#–í–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #BigData #Architect #ELK #Python #–£–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–Ω–æ

Big Data Architect with ELK,
Remote Russia

Description
Luxoft Autonomous Drive, a department of Luxoft's Automotive Line of Business, is an expert and delivery center for design, implementation and test of embedded architecture and software solutions for automotive systems. Our international team is based in various locations all over Europe and working with OEMs and Tier1s from all over the world.

We are searching for an Elastic Architect to increase an already existing small team, partially from Luxoft, partially from our customer and other suppliers. Together the team shall evolve and develop a Datawarehouse which is taking various data inputs. Data sources range from Jenkins over static code analysis to log files from embedded devices. These are used for specific metrics to show the health of a component of a project and the overall status of projects. All of this presented with Kibana with different levels of abstraction (for developer, managers and other stakeholders)

Project Goals:
Datawarehouse with Elastisearch and Kibana for metric evaluation

Technologies used in Project:
Elasticsearch and Kibana, Groovy, Python and others to be introduced

Opportunities:
‚Ä¢ International team, Workshops
‚Ä¢ Working for large German OEM
‚Ä¢ Grow personally and professionally
‚Ä¢ If needed, we can help you with relocation process.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Develop and design architecture and infrastructure for the cloud based solution
‚Ä¢ Develop and design elastic search ingress for new sources
‚Ä¢ Develop/apply metrics designed by the customer
‚Ä¢ Design presentation of metrics with Kibana
‚Ä¢ Develop new components and applications according to customer requirements
‚Ä¢ Work in an existing SCRUM team 

Skills:
‚Ä¢ 2+ years‚Äô experience in Elastic Stack components (mostly Elasticsearch and Kibana)
‚Ä¢ Experience with troubleshooting Elasticsearch indexes, metrics, creating Kibana dashboards
‚Ä¢ Big Data Architecture experience (Apache Hadoop, splunk, newrelic, teamscale)
‚Ä¢ Understanding of ELK idiomatics
‚Ä¢ Basic understanding of Lucene
‚Ä¢ Basic knowledge with Python
‚Ä¢ Able to work on problems independently and proactively
‚Ä¢ Upper-intermediate English B2

Nice to have:
‚Ä¢ Automotive background
‚Ä¢ Experience with measuring systems under load and load distribution between nodes
‚Ä¢ Understanding of Kafka
‚Ä¢ Understanding of Hadoop
‚Ä¢ Experience with Ruby
‚Ä¢ Experience as software architect
‚Ä¢ Experience as cloud architect
‚Ä¢ Experience as datawarehouse designer
‚Ä¢ Experience with Groovy

Contacts & CV:
Irina @idesiatova

Company: PeakData AG

Do you like working with data? Do you like the challenge of building high-performance systems
with elegant architecture? Are you passionate about code quality (PEP, unit tests, code reviews
within Merge Requests)? Do you bloom in an environment, where every developer is encouraged to critique solutions (in a kind/non-personal way!) to strive for excellence of the product rather than staying silent and looking the other way?

Our stack is: Many CSV‚Äôs that mostly fit into RAM, MongoDB, Python3.7, Docker + Swarms (everything is dockerized), GitLab, Skype for comm (always with video for calls). You must already have extensive experience in Python, the rest can easily be learned on-the-job

What we offer:
* Very interesting and innovative data product which includes real-world web data at scale (Tera to Petabytes)

* Salary range: 2.8K - 3.6K USD (depending on the skills and experience)

* Highly professional and innovative team (most of our team members have either Masters or PhD)

* Flexible work environment with opportunity to work remotely at pajamas from your kitchen and still be part of interesting and innovative project üôÇ

If you feel like you might be a good fit please drop us a message at mfeldman@peakdata.ch

Do you like working with data? Do you like the challenge of building high-performance systems
with elegant architecture? Are you passionate about code quality (PEP, unit tests, code reviews
within Merge Requests)? Do you bloom in an environment, where every developer is encouraged to critique solutions (in a kind/non-personal way!) to strive for excellence of the product rather than staying silent and looking the other way?
* Highly professional and innovative team (most of our team members have either Masters or PhD)
If you feel like you might be a good fit please drop us a message at mfeldman@peakdata.ch

stack:
Machine Learning: Tensorflow, Python, C++
Backend: Python, Django
Infrastructure: Gitlab CI, Kubernetes
Frontend: React, Redux, Three.js

Background
The role is within the Front Office Strats dev team that is responsible for building and maintaining the current Risk and P&L platform used globally by a number of business units (Rates, Credit, Emerging Markets, Wealth Management etc.) and is also working on the new strategic platform that will replace it. The team is geographically split mainly across Moscow and London, with team management, project management, development, analysis and testing being undertaken in both locations.

Overall Purpose of the Role
We are looking for experienced (3+ years) Python developer to work on risk calculation platform within global Strats Team.

Main Responsibilities
As a team member you will be:
‚Ä¢ Working in cross-functional agile team on the whole stack of the system;
‚Ä¢ Communicating with stakeholders (Strats Team) to understand their needs;

‚Ä¢ Maintaining system in production;
‚Ä¢ Participating in product delivery process alignment and improvement;

‚Ä¢ Data structures and algorithms;
‚Ä¢ Data manipulation Python libraries: NumPy, Pandas;
‚Ä¢ Persistence integration & data manipulation (SQL, ORM frameworks);
‚Ä¢ Agile development methodologies (Scrum, TDD);
‚Ä¢ Software development lifecycle and DevOps utilities;
‚Ä¢ Verbal/written communication in English on technical topics.

Experience / Requirements (will be a plus)
‚Ä¢ Java language 8+
‚Ä¢ Distributed caching solutions (Hazelcast, Apache Ignite, Oracle Coherence);
‚Ä¢ Front-end technologies: JavaScript, GWT, Thymeleaf, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS;
‚Ä¢ Container technologies (Docker, OpenShift)
‚Ä¢ C/C++ experience

Environment & Technologies
‚Ä¢ Team of around 30 members located in Moscow, London
‚Ä¢ OS: Linux
‚Ä¢ Language: Java 8, Spring 4-5, Python 3, C++
‚Ä¢ UI: JQuery, GWT, JSP, Bootstrap, Thymeleaf
‚Ä¢ Database: Oracle

‚Ä¢ Caches: Oracle Coherence, Hazelcast, Apache Ignite,
‚Ä¢ Build/Deploy: Jenkins, Artifactory, Maven
‚Ä¢ VCS: Git

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer

We‚Äôre Giant.AI - an American startup with HQ in California and a small but rapidly growing team in Saint-Petersburg. Today we have everything to become the best employer for ML professionals ever, because we have: 
- Mind-blowing product which has all odds to change the world and truly make a difference
-  Fabulous team with great scientists and best engineers
-   Support of VC investors, including Bill Gates‚Äô Investment Fund!üî•

Today we‚Äôre announcing an opening of Senior ML Engineer position, which suggests not only active development but also deep research. We deal with reinforcement learning, representation and adversarial learning. 

Desired Qualifications:
-          Experience with Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning, NLP and Computer Vision
-          Experience with PyTorch and TensorFlow
-          Strong Python or C++
-          Good English, enough for speaking and writing
-          Highly organized and responsible. We don‚Äôt micromanage and expect proactive approach to work.
-          Ability to look at things from different angles and on different levels.
-          Passion for robotics, machine learning, computer vision.

We are ready to discuss the product and the tasks during an interview in detail, including video demonstrations. However, today we are ready to share those details only after the NDA signing. -          Flexible working hours
-          Medical insurance
-          Possibility to participate in conferences, meetups etc.
-          Our main treasure: the team, which consists of brilliant engineers and scientists

If you‚Äôre not sure that you fully qualify, feel free to contact us anyway. We‚Äôre open and happy to start a conversation about your career at Giant.AI!

Vacancy: Software Analyst/Analyst BI (relocation to Montenegro/Podgorica)
Company: Libertex Group (Forex)
Employment: Full-time 
Salary:  3500$ - 5000$ net
Libertex is an international brand operating for over twenty years in financial markets and online commerce. Libertex provides investors with access to trading stocks, currencies, indices, commodities, gold, oil, gas and many other financial instruments. The Libertex team has more than 2,200,000 customers in Latin America, Europe and Asia - primarily due to delivering first-class service. Libertex has more than 150 commercial instruments. In 2016, Libertex was recognized by Forex EXPO Awards as the best trading platform; and Global Banking and Finance Review named it the best trading application in the EAEU.
Software analyst studies the software application domain, prepares software requirements, and specification (Software Requirements Specification) documents. The software analyst is the seam between the software users and the software developers. Work requires to convey the demands of software users to the developers.

‚úÖ What Will You Do?

Works with internal customers and IT partners to develop and analyze business intelligence needs
Interprets business requirements and determines optimum BI solutions to meet needs.
Identifies and provides input to new technology opportunities that will have an impact on the enterprise wide BI systems.
Designs Institute-wide ‚Äúviews‚Äù and custom reports.
May perform analysis for a wide range of requests using data in different formats and from various platforms.
Researches business problems and creates models that help analyze these business problems.
Work with architects and analysts from other teams to understand technical requirements and systems dependencies;
Write acceptance criteria/technical criteria to be consumed by developers through the release cycle;
Requirements management throughout the life cycle: from collecting requirements to acceptance, and supporting them in actual state;
Develop the design documentation and supporting it in actual state;
Support further development and testing, finding answers on any questions regarding requirements and appearing unclear details;
Present the system functionality and new products.
‚úÖ Requirements
Key Skills Required
Minimum experience - At least 3 years in Software Development / Business analysis / DWH development/QA in BI
Experience with Microsoft BI (Analysis Services, Reporting Services) or something like this
Should be able to understand business requirements and translate to information architecture and software development;
Strong problem-solving ability, critical thinking skills and creative/innovative thinking;
Strong skills in technical writing (short, clear, complete texts);
Strong skills in interviewing and communication;
Strong skills in simultaneous communication with multiple stakeholders and within the development team;
Multitasking and attention to details;
Technical English; ability to pass an interview in English
‚úÖ Benefits
Work in a dynamic and fast-paced international company
Beautiful emerging European destination (Montenegro, Podgorica)
Low cost of living
Generous relocation package
Competitive tax free salary
Comprehensive medical insurance for all family members
Annual reimbursement of flight home for employee and family
21 working days of annual leave plus 14 days public holidays
Fun and friendly professional environment
Use of leading technologies and modern business practices such as Agile
Excellent training and development opportunities
Rapidly expanding global footprint
Contact: @OlgaVzh
